name: Greninja
author: Sanosuke Sakuma
flavor_text: It appears and vanishes with a ninja’s grace. It toys with its enemies using swift movements, while slicing them with throwing stars of sharpest water.

attacks.name: Aqua Shower
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent’s Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Dual Cut
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 60 damage times the number of heads.
